verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* looked directly \w at|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Sanhedrin|strong="G4892"\w* \f + \fr 23:1 \ft Or the Council; also in verses 6, 15, 20, and 28\f* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “Brothers, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* conducted \w myself|strong="G1473"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.”

\w At|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w the|strong="G1161"\w* high priest Ananias \w ordered|strong="G2004"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* near \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w strike|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w strike|strong="G5180"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w whitewashed|strong="G2867"\w* \w wall|strong="G5109"\w*! \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* here \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w yourself|strong="G4771"\w* violate \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w commanding|strong="G2753"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w struck|strong="G5180"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* \w nearby|strong="G3936"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w How|strong="G1161"\w* dare \w you|strong="G3004"\w* insult \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w high|strong="G2316"\w* priest \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*!”

“Brothers,” \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1063"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w aware|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* high priest, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: ‘\w Do|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w evil|strong="G2560"\w* \w about|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G2992"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.’\f + \fr 23:5 \ft Exodus 22:28 (see also LXX)\f*”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w called|strong="G3972"\w* \w out|strong="G2896"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Sanhedrin|strong="G4892"\w*, “Brothers, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*. \w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* resurrection \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w trial|strong="G2919"\w*.”

\w As|strong="G1161"\w* \w soon|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2980"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w a|strong="G1096"\w* dispute broke \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w between|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w assembly|strong="G4128"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w divided|strong="G4977"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* resurrection, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* angels, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="G3670"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w A|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w clamor|strong="G2906"\w* \w arose|strong="G1096"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w party|strong="G3313"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w got|strong="G1096"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* contended sharply, “\w We|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w*. \w What|strong="G3588"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* angel \w has|strong="G1096"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*?”

\w The|strong="G1519"\w* dispute grew \w so|strong="G1161"\w* violent \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w commander|strong="G5506"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* tear \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w pieces|strong="G1288"\w*. \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w ordered|strong="G2753"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4753"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* remove \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* force \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w bring|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w barracks|strong="G3925"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w following|strong="G1966"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w stood|strong="G2186"\w* \w near|strong="G2186"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Take|strong="G2293"\w* \w courage|strong="G2293"\w*! \w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w testified|strong="G3140"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w testify|strong="G3140"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*.” The Plot to Kill Paul (John 16:1–4)

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w daylight|strong="G2250"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w*, \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w formed|strong="G4160"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="G4160"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* bound \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G1438"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* oath \w not|strong="G3383"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w or|strong="G3383"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w had|strong="G3972"\w* killed \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w More|strong="G4119"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* involved \w in|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w plot|strong="G4945"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w We|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* bound \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* solemn oath \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G1089"\w* \w anything|strong="G3367"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* killed \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Sanhedrin|strong="G4892"\w* petition \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w commander|strong="G5506"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* pretext \w of|strong="G4012"\w* examining \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w case|strong="G3588"\w* \w more|strong="G1161"\w* carefully. \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* kill \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w way|strong="G5613"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*’s sister heard \w about|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* plot,\f + \fr 23:16 \ft Or the ambush\f* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w barracks|strong="G3925"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* told \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, “\w Take|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w young|strong="G3494"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w commander|strong="G5506"\w*; \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* tell \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* centurion \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w commander|strong="G5506"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, “\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w sent|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w bring|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w tell|strong="G2980"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.”

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w commander|strong="G5506"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w young|strong="G3739"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w drew|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w aside|strong="G2596"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G4441"\w*, “\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w need|strong="G2192"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* tell \w me|strong="G1473"\w*?”

\w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w The|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w agreed|strong="G4934"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Sanhedrin|strong="G4892"\w* tomorrow \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* pretext \w of|strong="G4012"\w* acquiring \w more|strong="G1161"\w* information \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w persuade|strong="G3982"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w because|strong="G1063"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w waiting|strong="G4327"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* ambush \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* bound \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* oath \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* killed \w him|strong="G3588"\w*; \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, awaiting \w your|strong="G2532"\w* consent.”

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G4314"\w* \w commander|strong="G5506"\w* dismissed \w the|strong="G4314"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w and|strong="G3767"\w* \w instructed|strong="G3853"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Do|strong="G3367"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w tell|strong="G1583"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3367"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* reported \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.” Paul Sent to Felix

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Prepare|strong="G2090"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w seventy|strong="G1440"\w* \w horsemen|strong="G2460"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w spearmen|strong="G1187"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*.\f + \fr 23:23 \ft That is, at nine tonight\f*

\w Provide|strong="G3936"\w* \w mounts|strong="G2934"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w take|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w safely|strong="G1295"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*.”
\w And|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w following|strong="G2192"\w* \w letter|strong="G1992"\w*:

\w Claudius|strong="G2804"\w* \w Lysias|strong="G3079"\w*, \w To|strong="G3588"\w* \w His|strong="G3588"\w* Excellency, \w Governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*: \w Greetings|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w seized|strong="G4815"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w about|strong="G3195"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* kill \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w my|strong="G5259"\w* \w troops|strong="G4753"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w rescue|strong="G1807"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. \w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Roman|strong="G4514"\w* citizen,
